justification: Acknowledges B’s need to win now and playoff slate interest, offering a veteran WR plus RB depth, and contrasts A’s consolidation goal. But it glosses over B’s contrarian tilt toward established talent (rookie RB may be undervalued), doesn’t explicitly leverage B’s WR scarcity or RB surplus, and overstates a win-now upgrade versus giving up a steady Tier-2 RB. Coherent but thin rationale.
